snippet: The Denver Post photographer Craig F. Walker and the Agence France-Presse photographer Massoud Hossaini won the 2012 Pulitzer Prizes for photography.
abstract: The Denver Post photographer Craig F. Walker and the Agence France-Presse photographer Massoud Hossaini won the 2012 Pulitzer Prizes for photography.

byline.original: By KERRI MACDONALD and JAMES ESTRIN

headline.main: Pulitzer Prizes: The Effects of War at Home
